title: Brilliant opening credits for (imaginary) House of Leaves movie
content: I came across [this wonderful student(?) project](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420014433/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=Gyug0q9eyqw) while searching for any sign that _House of Leaves_ might ever be made into a movie. It blew me away!
author: pica pusher

comments.content: Very cool. Some of that reminded me of the visuals I imagined when reading _The Raw Shark Texts_.
